trans-unit.source: Represents the value returned from a database comparison operation between Oracle data types, and exposes methods used to perform data type conversions.

The key difference between an OracleBoolean structure and a standard **Boolean** value is that, where a standard `Boolean` has two possible values, `true` and `false`, an OracleBoolean structure has three possible values, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False>, or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>.
An OracleBoolean structure does not map to an Oracle `Boolean` data type; it is exposed as a convenience support class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure using the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> to be used as the initial value of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure using the specified integer.
If `value` is 0, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> is `false`; otherwise it is `true`.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> to be used as the initial value of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
Computes the bitwise AND of two specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structures.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The result of the logical AND operation as shown in the following table.
Value of x
Value of y Result
Compares this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure to a specified object and returns an indication of their relative values.
Any instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>, regardless of its value, is considered greater than a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
An object to compare, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
A signed number indicating the relative values of the instance and value.
Value
Description
A negative integer
This instance is less than value.
Zero
This instance is equal to value.
A positive integer
This instance is greater than value.
-or- value is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Compares the supplied object parameter to the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
The object to be compared.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if object is an instance of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> and the two are equal; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Compares two <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structures to determine if they are equal.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.

An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are equal or <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are not equal.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref>.

Represents a false value that can be assigned to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The False field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
To be added.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
Indicates whether the current <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False"></xref>.
If the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A> is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, this property still is `false`.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Indicates whether or not the value of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure is null.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> value of the structure is **Null**, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Indicates whether the current <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True"></xref>.
If the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A> is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, this property still is `false`.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> to determine if they are not equal.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.

An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are not equal or <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are equal.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref>.

Represents a null value that can be assigned to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The Null field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
To be added.

Represents a value of one that can be assigned to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The One field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
To be added.
Performs a ones complement operation on the supplied <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structures.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The one's complement of the supplied <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
If the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> contains a null value the result also is a null value.
Computes the bitwise AND of two specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structures.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The result of the logical AND operation as shown in the following table.
Value of x
Value of y Result
Computes the bitwise OR of its two <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> operands.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The result of the bitwise OR operation as shown in the following table.
Value of x
Value of y Result
Compares two instances of an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> for equality.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.

An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are equal or <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are not equal.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Performs a bitwise exclusive-OR operation on the supplied <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> parameters.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The results of the bitwise XOR operation as shown in the following table.
Value of x
Value of y Result

To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
Used to test the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> to determine whether it is false.
The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure to be tested.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the supplied parameter <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is false; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
To be added.
To be added.
Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> for inequality.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.

An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are not equal or <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are equal.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Performs a NOT operation on an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> on which the NOT operation is performed.

An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> with the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*><xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True"></xref> if argument was true, <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref> if argument was null, and <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False"></xref> otherwise.
Performs a one's complement operation on the specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The one's complement of the specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
Used to test the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> to determine whether it is true.
The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure to be tested.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the supplied parameter <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is true; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Performs a bitwise OR operation on the two specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structures.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The result of the bitwise OR operation as shown in the following table.
Value of x
Value of y Result
Converts the specified <xref:System.String> representation of a logical value to its <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> equivalent.
The <xref:System.String> to be converted.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure containing the parsed value.
Converts the current <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> to a string.
A string containing the value of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
If the value is null, the string contains a null value.

Represents a true value that can be assigned to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The True field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
To be added.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure's value.
This property is read-only.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True"></xref>; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Performs a bitwise exclusive-OR operation on the supplied parameters.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The results of the logical XOR operation as shown in the following table.
Value of x
Value of y Result

Represents a value of zero that can be assigned to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The Zero field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
To be added.
